column2: "Sɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn twitwa amanaman a ɔdze hɔn asaase rema wo gu
"yiyi nkurow ebiasa si hɔ ma woho wɔ asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo dɛ fa no mu."
"Siesie ɔkwan no ma woho
column3: na paapaa asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn rema enya edzi no n’ahe mu ebiasa na onyimpakumfo biara eeguan akɔ hɔ."

column2: "Na onyimpakumfo a onguan nkɔ hɔ na onnya nkwa no n’asɛm nye yi: nyia oku ne nyɛnko awerɛfir mu
"dɛ nyimpa nye ne nyɛnko kɔ kwaa mu rukotwa dua
column3: na ne nsa ma abɔndua do dze eetwa dua no
column4: na ne tsidadze no hɔn fi no kura mu
column6: ma owu a; onguan nkɔ nkurow yi kor mu na onnya nkwa:"

column2: "amma bɔgya ho ɔwerdzinyi no eenntsiw nyimpakumfo no
column3: aber a n’akoma ayɛ hyew no
column4: na osiandɛ ɔkwan no war ntsi ɔaannkɔto no
column5: na ɔaammbɔ no ɔbɔtɔr; naaso na nyimpakumfo no nnsɛ wu
column6: susuampa dɛ ɔnntan no dada bi no."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na merehyɛ wo dɛ yiyi nkurow ebiasa si hɔ ma woho."
"Na sɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn tserɛw wo he mu
column3: dɛ mbrɛ ɔaka ntam akyerɛ w’egyanom
column4: na ɔdze asaase no a ɔbɔɔ anohoba dɛ ɔdze bɛma w’egyanom no nyinara ma wo:"

column2: "sɛ idzi mbrasɛm yi nyinara a merehyɛ wo ndɛ da yi do eyɛ
column4: na anantsew n’akwan do daa a; ɔno yiyi nkurow ebiasa so ka ebiasa yi ho si hɔ ma woho:"

column2: "na wɔaannka bɔgya a onndzi so enngu wɔ w’asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo dɛ egyapadze no mu
"Na sɛ nyimpa bi tan ne nyɛnko
column5: na ɔbɔ no ɔbɔtɔr ma owu; na oguan kɔ nkurow yi kor mu a:"

column2: "ɔno no kurow no mu mpanyimfo nsoma ma wɔnkɛfa no wɔ hɔ na wɔmfa no nhyɛ bɔgya ho ɔwerdzinyi no nsa
"Mma w’enyiwa nnhu no mbɔbɔr
column3: na yi bɔgya a onndzi so fi Israel

column2: "Mma nntwe wo nyɛnko n’asaasehe a tsetsefo no dze esi
column3: wɔ w’egyapadze a ibenya edzi wɔ asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo dɛ fa no do."

column2: "Ɔdasefo baako nnsoɛr nntsia nyimpa bi wɔ emumuyɛ biara
column4: wɔ bɔn biara a ɔyɛ ho: adasefo beenu anomu
column5: anaa adasefo baasa anomu na wɔmfa do nsi asɛm gyinae."

column2: "Sɛ ɔdasekrumfo bi soɛr tsia nyimpa bi dzi no mfom ho dase a;"
"ɔno nyimpa beenu nyina a ɔham no da hɔn ntamu no
column4: wɔ asɔfo nye ntsɛmbufo a wɔwɔ hɔ nda no mu no enyim;"

column2: "na ntsɛmbufo no nhwehwɛ mu yie: na
column5: na oedzi no nua dasekrum a;"

column2: "ɔno hom nyɛ no dɛ mbrɛ ɔdween dɛ nkyɛ ɔbɛyɛ no nua no: ama eeyi mbusu no efi wo mu."
"Na hɔn a wɔaka no ntsi
column3: na wonsuro na ɔdzekɔr yi wɔaammbɔ mbusu biara a ɔtse dɛm wɔ wo mu bio."

column2: "Na mma w’enyiwa nnhu mbɔbɔr; nkwa nhyɛ nkwa ananmu
